entries.journal_entry_completion_summary: Alliin wanted to retire from being a Meatlump, but needed your help. As his replacement, you not only allow Alliin to retire, but also have infiltrated the Meatlumps themselves.
entries.journal_entry_description: Vani Korr has asked you to find a way into the Meatlump Hideout. First, you must find out where it is. To that end, you are investigating an old Meatlump in Coronet who is smashing some generators.
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: An old Meatlump was seen smashing some generators in Northeast Coronet. Go Investigate.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: Speak with Alliin's lieutenant, Kaiya Merel. If she will give you a chance as a Meatlump, not only will you have a way in, but you'll also help Alliin be able to retire. You'll find her near the theater according to Alliin.
